time column. If not, you may want to look at imputing the missing values, resampling the data
to a new time scale, or developing a model that can handle missing values. Here, we just drop
the Ô¨Årst column:
# example of dropping the time dimension from the dataset
from numpy import array
# define the dataset
data = list()
n = 5000
for i in range(n):
data.append([i+1, (i+1)*10])
data = array(data)
# drop time
data = data[:, 1]
print(data.shape)
Listing 6.17: Example of dropping the time column.
